meanings.definition: The upper part of a woman's dress, covering the chest and back.
meanings.sent1: The bodices of the dresses were beautifully embroidered.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the bodices of her dresses before the event.
meanings.sent3: The bodices of the dresses seemed to have a mind of their own, always staying perfectly in place.
meanings.sent4: Her strong will was like the bodices of a dress, holding everything together with grace.
meanings.sent5: The intricate lace on the bodices added a touch of elegance to the outfits.

meanings.sent1: The shop displayed various bodices in different colors.
meanings.sent2: They bought new bodices for the upcoming performance.
meanings.sent3: The bodices in the store seemed to whisper fashion secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The bodices on display sparkled like a treasure trove of fashion.
meanings.sent5: The collection of bodices was a sight to behold, each unique in its design.
